title: Client Very Slow...Can't Accept The Match!!
body:
Soo...I'm Using 3g Internet Connection (Wich Works Pretty Well -90ms-) By Sharing It From My Phone
         I'm Recently Banned And My Client is Always Lagging And The Sound Is Glitching...But The Problem Is .....
         When I Wait For My Ban, A Match Is Founded "Yay ^^" But The "Match Found" Window Doesn't Get Displayed
         So I'm Wasting My For Nothing,Everything Just Started After Downloading Net.Framework 4.6 -.-*
 
Guys,Here Are My Computer Composants:
            Dell Inspiron 530:
            Intel Pentium Dual CPU E2180 2.00 Ghz
            RAM: 2 Gb
            Video Card; Nvidia Geforce GT 520 2Gb VRAM
            Windows 7 Integral Service Pack 1 

                                                                                                         HELP ME GUYS I'M DESPERATE :'(

replies.body: Yeeeaaa running off of that hotspot is going to be that main issue here. While hotspots are great for being able to get internet access on the fly wherever you are, they really aren't going to work very well for online pvp gaming where you need to maintain a stable connection. You aren't able to see the Match Found message in time due to the lag between your network and your phone hotspot.

You probably need real internet lol, not gonna be a problem with your PC. Your ISP and Riots servers are most likely having problems sending info between the two and so that's why the "Match Found" screen isn't popping up for you in time to accept it.
